samplr 0.0.0.9000

    • time-comparisons

    time-comparisons

    time-comparisons.Rmd
    library(samplr)

    All samplers run for 1024 iterations.

    R

    pdf <- SampleR::make_distr_pdf(distr::Norm())
X <- bench::mark(
    SampleR::sampler_mcmc(pdf, 1, sigma_prop = 1),
    SampleR::sampler_mc3(pdf, 1, sigma_prop = 1),
    SampleR::sampler_hmc(pdf, 1),
    SampleR::sampler_nuts(pdf, 1, .5),
    check = FALSE,
)
#> Warning: Some expressions had a GC in every iteration; so filtering is disabled.
print(X[,c("expression", "min", "median")])
#> # A tibble: 4 x 3
#>   expression                                         min   median
#>   <bch:expr>                                    <bch:tm> <bch:tm>
#> 1 SampleR::sampler_mcmc(pdf, 1, sigma_prop = 1)   34.2ms   36.5ms
#> 2 SampleR::sampler_mc3(pdf, 1, sigma_prop = 1)   431.2ms  431.9ms
#> 3 SampleR::sampler_hmc(pdf, 1)                   808.8ms  808.8ms
#> 4 SampleR::sampler_nuts(pdf, 1, 0.5)             549.5ms  549.5ms

    C++

    X <- bench::mark(
    samplr::sampler_mcmc("norm", c(0,1), 1, sigma_prop=1),
    samplr::sampler_mc3("norm", c(0,1), 1, sigma_prop=1),
    samplr::sampler_hmc("norm", c(0,1), 1),
    samplr::sampler_nuts("norm", c(0,1), 1),
    check = FALSE,
)
print(X[,c("expression", "min", "median")])
#> # A tibble: 4 x 3
#>   expression                                                    min   median
#>   <bch:expr>                                               <bch:tm> <bch:tm>
#> 1 samplr::sampler_mcmc("norm", c(0, 1), 1, sigma_prop = 1)  513.7us  545.4us
#> 2 samplr::sampler_mc3("norm", c(0, 1), 1, sigma_prop = 1)    5.79ms   6.04ms
#> 3 samplr::sampler_hmc("norm", c(0, 1), 1)                    6.05ms   6.45ms
#> 4 samplr::sampler_nuts("norm", c(0, 1), 1)                  12.56ms  13.64ms

    MATLAB

    tests timeit
    Metropolis-Hastings 6.22ms
    MC3 55.13ms

    C++

    options(width = 300)
X <- bench::mark(
    samplr::sampler_mcmc("mvnorm", list(c(0,1), diag(2)), c(0,0), sigma_prop=diag(2)),
    samplr::sampler_mc3("mvnorm", list(c(0,1), diag(2)), c(0,0), sigma_prop=diag(2)),
    samplr::sampler_hmc("mvnorm", list(c(0,1), diag(2)), c(0,0)),
    # samplr::sampler_nuts("mvnorm", list(c(0,1), diag(2)), c(0,0)),
    check = FALSE,
)
print(X[,c("expression", "min", "median")])
#> # A tibble: 3 x 3
#>   expression                                                                                 min   median
#>   <bch:expr>                                                                            <bch:tm> <bch:tm>
#> 1 samplr::sampler_mcmc("mvnorm", list(c(0, 1), diag(2)), c(0, 0), sigma_prop = diag(2))  753.5us  783.5us
#> 2 samplr::sampler_mc3("mvnorm", list(c(0, 1), diag(2)), c(0, 0), sigma_prop = diag(2))    7.89ms   8.12ms
#> 3 samplr::sampler_hmc("mvnorm", list(c(0, 1), diag(2)), c(0, 0))                         16.16ms  16.67ms
